EnvironmentStatus.description: The status of the Amazon DataZone environment.
EnvironmentStatus.markdownDescription:
The status of the Amazon DataZone environment.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | CREATING | UPDATING | DELETING | CREATE_FAILED | UPDATE_FAILED | DELETE_FAILED | VALIDATION_FAILED | SUSPENDED | DISABLED | EXPIRED | DELETED | INACCESSIBLE  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentAccountIdentifier.description: The AWS account in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.
EnvironmentAccountIdentifier.markdownDescription:
The AWS account in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^\d{12}$  
Update requires: Replacement

EnvironmentAccountRegion.description: The AWS region in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.
EnvironmentAccountRegion.markdownDescription:
The AWS region in which the Amazon DataZone environment is created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[a-z]{2}-[a-z]{4,10}-\d$  
Update requires: Replacement

The description of the Amazon DataZone environment.

Update requires: No interruption

The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the environment would be created.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^dzd[-_][a-zA-Z0-9_-]{1,36}$
